messages.message:
Refiner does not handle special characters in field names

We allow special characters in ML Studio since we have code in both ibformers (https://github.com/instabase/ibformers/blob/main/ibformers/training/refiner_module_generator.py#L31) and the extraction step (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/flow-step-lib/flow-steps/src/py/instabase/flow_steps/extract/extraction_step_utils.py#L24) to replace special characters in field names

@pauline.comising is it possible to do this in `ibllm` as well? this would allow the AI Hub frontend to allow special characters in field names

it would be great to get this in for 23.09!

cc @lydia
